message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $13,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate you recognizing the value of this product. I can come down a bit to $11,500.  This is my best offer and I think it's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to meet your price, but I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
